name: Anthony Colle
profile: Enthusiastic and curious Software Developer with a background in Digital Marketing, including SEO, UX and Big Data analysis.

Holding a Higher Diploma in Computer Science in Software Development (1st Class Honours) at National College of Ireland, as well as a Masterâ€™s in Management (Digital Marketing) from DCU Business School.
In-depth knowledge of the Modern Web Full Stack, including React.js, Angular, Node.js, Express.js and MongoDB. Enjoys building dynamic websites and applications from development to production.
Strong skills in Java, RESTful APIs architecture, HTML/CSS/JavaScript, TypeScript, RDMS, SQL, PL/SQL, UNIX Scripting, Python, R and version control tool Git.
Excellent communicator & collaborator, familiar with Agile methodologies, and proven record of successfully building & delivering enterprise level products & applications.

skills.name: React.js
skills.description: Designed and developed multiple modern applications with React, using the latest APIs such as Hooks and Context. In-depth understanding of props, state management and lifecycle methods.

skills.name: Angular
skills.description: Developed several CRUD apps using the Angular framework. Integrated services, authentication guards and request interceptors. Comfortable with Typescript.

skills.name: Node.js, Express.js & MongoDB
skills.description: Worked on multiple applications using this stack with either React or Angular to develop the front-end, or with template engines such as Pug, Mustache or EJS. Projects include secure REST APIs for CRUD operations with both JWT and session authentication, integration of 3rd Party APIs such as Stripe for payment processing, and implementation of the WebSocket protocol to develop real-time applications.

skills.name: JavaScript
skills.description: Strong skills in JavaScript, both inside and outside the browser, and in asynchronous and event-driven programming. Experienced with the main ES6, ES7 & ES8 features, such as arrow functions, new loops iterators, promises, async/await constructions & destructuring patterns.

skills.name: Java
skills.description: Worked on multiple projects using Servlets, advanced linear and non-linear data structures, sorting and searching algorithms and RESTful APIs using JAX-RS and Hibernate for data persistence. Good fundamentals of Object-Oriented and algorithm design, problem solving & complexity analysis.

skills.name: HTML/CSS
skills.description: Great knowledge of the structure and workflow of websites and web applications. Thriving for good design, and ensuring fully responsiveness of the UI. Familiar with CSS animations, SCSS/SASS & BEM syntax.

skills.name: Python
skills.description: Learnt prior any formal education, mostly for Statistics and Machine Learning (ML) purposes. Used for data analysis and advanced ML algorithms (regression, classification, & reinforcement).

skills.name: RDBMS, SQL & PL/SQL
skills.description: In-depth understanding of the relational model of data, including Primary and Foreign keys, normalisation, stored procedure and triggers, to ensure the integrity of business data at all times. Ability to design, create and query databases using advanced SQL queries and PL/SQL scripts.

skills.name: UNIX Scripting
skills.description: Experienced with the Unix shell for common tasks and ability to write intermediate scripts.

education.degree: Higher Diploma in Computer Sciences (Software Development)
education.modules: Software Development (95%), Introduction to Databases (83%), Web Design (92%), Architecture, OS & Network (80%), Object-Oriented Software Engineering (78%), Data Structures & Algorithms (74%), Web Services & API Development (67%), Server Side Development (70%) and Advanced Programming (84%), Project (74%)
